article_title: At least 42,227 people killed in Gaza since 7 October last year - health ministry.
sentence: At  least  42,227  people  have  been  killed  in  Israeli  attacks  in  Gaza  since  October  7  2023,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.

article_title: At least 42,227 people killed in Gaza since 7 October last year - health ministry.
sentence: In  a  statement  published  this  afternoon,  the  ministry  has  referred  to  "many"  dead  and  wounded  in  the  streets  and  under  rubble  where  ambulance  crews  cannot  get  to  them.
